 Tasks within this role included:

Manage and monitor the actual performance of the structural and architectural design during
construction stage. This includes coordination of technical issues with sub contractors and internal
technical support units.

Coordination with both the Project Manager and Consultant to establish the change requirements and
ensure effects of ongoing amendments to the design are advised to all parties.

Chairing of Subcontractor meetings to ensure material delivery schedules, programs and all
outstanding actions are being completed. 
 

Monitoring the construction programs. 

Coordination of clients Interiors Design contractor with sub contractor to ensure smooth transition of
trades to facilitate the program.
Page 1 of 8

 Provide monthly technical reports to lead architects and superiors. 

Calculate material requirements and arrangements. Arranging the equipments for all type works.
Preparing check list before pouring works and preparing the RFI (request for information) &
inspection request. 

Final check with consultants and modify the work as per comments. Maintain the measurement book
and visualize the output from the manpower.

Make the final bill and submit to client. 

At the time of purchasing the material like wood, tile, bathroom fittings, electrical fittings & Paint
etc, consult with client and get material approval.

Finalize the quantity of subcontractors works and deduct the advance and weekly payment from
total amount of works. In the case of some Critical site work condition take the correct own
decision and follow that same way. Such type of official work like planning department, Public
work department, electricity board, municipality, involved those type work also. 

Checking & preparation of the sub contractor monthly bills payments for various types of works.

.

Evaluate premises for cleanliness, including proper garbage disposal and lack of vermin infestation.

Establish and maintain all architects, correspondence, change orders, meeting minutes, supplemented
instructions, request for information, request for changes and all correspondence between Architect
Engineer, and the contractor.

Compose and submit weekly status reports, weekly percentage completion reports, and daily reports
to include project conditions,temperature,weather condition, general conditions, site Equipment used,

Tasks within this role included:

Heading the project specified execution team from mobilization to demobilization for the assigned
job till completion of the project.

Regular inspection of materials delivered to site and maintenance of record.

Responsible for day to day activities on site, maintenance of daily report and reporting to project
Manager daily.

Execution of the project as specified in the approved site execution plan, method statements and QC
documents.

Co-ordination between Head office and site for materials and logistics.

Responsible for planning of resource, assigning work and manage the team members, monitor quality
and standard of work while execution, timely completion of the project, implementation of Health

and safety procedure as per the company standards, maintain project documentation, Co-ordination
